original_text: Then the Lord said to Abraham, ‘Why did Sarah laugh like that? She said, “I am too old to have a child.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 아브라함에게 이르시되 사라가 왜 웃으며 이르기를 내가 늙었거늘 어떻게 아들을 낳으리요 하느냐

sentences.original_text: Then the Lord said to Abraham
Why did Sarah laugh like that?
I am too old to have a child
